Thunderhill Raceway Park.knownFor: “ Do you feel the need for SPEED? ” Reviewed May 20, 2015 This race track was built in 1993 and the CEO, Dave Vodden, has improved it continually ever since. The track is now 5 miles! but typically it is used in either a 3 mile or 2 mile configuration. When I was there May 15-16, there was a auto race on the 3 mile track and a motorcycle race on the... Great place to bird watch and take some fantastic photos. Do take the time to go off the beaten path and drive through. Stop and talk with people and employees within the Refuge.
Lots of wading birds and other critters. Organized with a visitor center. They will loan you binoculars.
This is our favorite wild life refuge. I never cease to be amazed anytime of the year at the bird life and, occasionally, deer and rabbit. This was our third winter visit... read more
small museum but so worth it, lots of local stuff back in the day there is even a basement floor with lots of cool things to see and read about
